data.name: BuiltInConditionTemplateInvalidOrder
data.value:
The use case "{0}" contains the following error in the {1} rule set:
The conditions in the template
{4} (position {5} from the top)
are broader than the conditions in the template
{2} (position {3} from the top)
The template further down in the sequence will therefore never be applied. How do you want to proceed?

The derived citation styles you are about to import originally belong to a different master citation style.

data.name: DesktopCitationStyleManager_messageCitationStyleDisabled
BuiltInCitationStyleEditWarning
data.value:
The citation style you want to open is a style provided by Swiss Academic Software.
You cannot edit this style, but you can create a copy to work on.
Do you want to continue?

data.name: BuiltInCitationStyleEditWarningInternal
data.value:
You want to edit the citation style '{0}'. This is a built-in style that all Citavi users can download from the Internet.
When you are finished editing the style, please do not forget to upload the file to the Citavi Cloud again in order to make changes available to all users.
data.comment: Internal warning -- not visible to customers. Please do not translate.

data.name: BuiltInCitationStyleOverwriteWarning
data.value:
The citation style you want to replace is a citation style included with Citavi. Technically we cannot prevent you from overwriting it. However, we strongly advise you against doing so because your work may be lost when a future Citavi update is installed.
Are you sure that you want to continue anyway?

data.name: CitationStyleChangesCouldNotBeSaved
data.value: The changes to the citation style could not be saved. Try again?

data.name: CitationStyleSavingRemovesC3CompatibilitiyWarning
data.value:
The style "{0}" is a Citavi 3 citation style. If you save changes with the same file name, the compatibility with Citavi 3 will be lost and you will no longer be able to use the style in Citavi 3.
If you would like to keep the original style and save your changes in a copy of the style, please click "Cancel". Then, click "File" > "Save as".

data.name: SaveChanges
data.value: Do you want to save changes?

data.name: ImportantHint_AbstractEvaluationTOCNotInWAI
data.value: Important: The fields "Abstract", "Table of contents", and "Evaluation" can contain large amounts of text, which would slow down the Word Add-In a great deal. For this reason, they can only be used in a project bibliography ("File" > "Print or save project bibliography"). Learn more.
